summary: A/C CONDENSER DEVELOPED A CRACK AND HAS FAILED / ALL FREON HAS LEAKED OUT, HAVE TRIED TO WORK WITH GM AND NOTHING BUT JUST TELLING US 2 TO 3 MONTHS OUT FOR THE PART / IT'S 99 DEGREES WITH 70% TODAY IN SOUTH CAROLINA PLUS THIS IS THE 9TH WEEK I HAVE NOTHING. THE LOCAL DEALERSHIP TRIED TO STEP IN AND HELP BECAUSE GM WOULD NOT AND THEY WILL NOT EVEN ANSWER THE DEALERSHIPS CALLS. I'M ONE PISSED OFF CONSUMER WITH NO OTHER PLACE TO TURN
